thread.title: Andrew Bunt
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Andrew Bunt

author: Andrew Bunt
title: Andrew Bunt
text: I would just like to thank the shower doctor for there quick action in supplying and sending the parts for my Mira shower. The shower is very old and I didn't think the parts would be available anymore but they proved me wrong and supplied them very promptly so I can highly recommend them and would certainly use them again if needed.
